altTitles.en: Holy Sword Woman

altTitles.ja: 神太刀女

description.en: Takuma Zushi just wanted to be left alone. He sleeps in class and skips club. While going home, he sees a girl walking into the woods and decides to follow her. There he witnesses a fight between two sword masters with the prize being the ownership of the "Kandachime", a sword that can take human form. That girl, Otowa Hagane was about to lose when he naively steps into the fight…

altTitles.ja: お姉ちゃんが来た

altTitles.en: Big Sister's Here!

description.en: The story revolves around Tomoya Mizuhara, a 13-year-old boy who suddenly gains a big sister when his father remarries. 17-year-old Ichika is a little strange, and her affection for Tomoya is rather overwhelming, if not scary. On top of things, Ichika's friend Ruri is the ultimate sadist. Then there is Ichika's big-breasted quarter-Russian friend Marina.

altTitles.en: The Law of Ueki

altTitles.ja: Ueki no Housoku
うえきの法則

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.ja: 今日のさんぽんた

description.en: The story of a dog, Ponta, and his walker, Rieko.

altTitles.en: Feel Good To Die
Til Death♡

description.en:
Everyone would be happier if this boss was dead…  
[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/703/)
description.uk: Усі були б щасливішими, якби цей бос помер…

description.en:
Juwon Lee works as a doppelganger who poses as a hero’s alter-ego, and fills in for them in their social life while they perform their duties as heroes. 

One day, Justice, the strongest hero, approaches Juwon and requests his services with the promise of a hefty payment in return for his work. However, when Juwon arrives at their meeting spot, he is instead greeted by a completely unexpected sight...

Futari Bocchi no Otasaa no Hime

description.en: Ooyama Takeko joins an otaku club in the hopes of being worshiped as a princess as she'd be the only female member, but the club she joins only has two members (including herself). Based on a one shot of the same name.
description.ja: 『小林さんちのメイドラゴン』などアニメ化多数の大人気作家が、初の週刊連載でYJに大登場！ 「ヲタクさんたちに”ちやほや”されたい！」 ”姫”を目指して大山武子が入ったオタサーは…、部員が二人しかいなかった！ 1年たっても二人っきりのサークルで、大山は立派な姫になれるのか!? 満たせ欲求！目指せ姫！天然ダメっ娘オタサーコメディ、開幕！

La duchesse monstrueuse et la princesse par contrat

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.ja: 働かないふたり

altTitles.en: The Jobless Siblings

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

title.en: I Can't Stop Doting On the Empire's Most Notorious Villainess!

altTitles.en: I Can't Stop Doting the Empire's Most Notorious Villainess!

altTitles.ja: 帝国一の悪女に溺愛がとまりません!

description.en: In high society, Raven is known as a womanizer and a free spirit. But suddenly, Estella, who’s rumored to hate men and is said to be the cruelest girl in the empire, walks into his bachelor life. And this girl proposes that he marry her! “There’s not a chance in hell this marriage will succeed,” thinks the young guy. But... Estella is convinced he’ll be the one to fall head over heels for her. How will it all pan out, and in the end, who will be right...

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.en: An Ordinary Light Music Club

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en:
With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
___
[Defunct Official English (MANGA Plus)](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100291)
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

altTitles.en: The Everyday Maintenance of Shinozaki-kun

altTitles.ja: 篠崎くんのメンテ事情

description.en:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
description.uk:
Шінодзакі – звичайнісінький офісний планктон, в якого, однак, останнім часом аж надто легко відвалюється голова. Та ще й раптом у його звичайне, за виключенням того прикрого непорозуміння, життя вривається молода жінка на ім'я Юуяке.

Вона стверджує, що її бабуся-чарівниця в минулому докорінно видозмінила тіло Шінодзакі – і тепер він набитий безліччю механізмів!

...Які, власне, потребують технічного обслуговування, яке Юуяке тепер, вочевидь, буде проводити на регулярній основі.

Якось так і починаються дещо безбарвні будні звичайнісінького офісного планктону, чаклунки та чудернацької чорної істоти на ім'я Ґрей!

altTitles.ja: 魔のものたち

altTitles.en: The Demon Bunch
Sir Liebe von Trapp

description.en: Tales of demons working in the Demon King Corps and a mimic targetting the life of an adventurer.
description.ja: これは魔のものたちが繰り広げる魔の奮闘記である

title.en: I Thought My Time Was Up!

altTitles.en: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!
I Thought It Was Time!

description.en:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

description.ko:
3개월 시한부 진단을 받은 공녀, 라리에트. 어차피 죽을 몸, 버킷리스트(라 쓰고 미친 짓이라 읽는) 달성을 해보기로 했다. 

첫째. 약혼자를 엿 먹이기. 
둘째. 괴물 공작 아스라한과 3개월 간 연애하기!  

그러나 그에게서 도망치고 나서야 깨닫고 말았다. 시한부 진단이 완벽한 오진이라는 사실을!

---

description.tr:
Leydi Lariet’e bir hastalık tanısı koyulmuş ve üç aylık ömrü kaldığı söylenmişti. “Zaten öleceğim, o halde aklımdan geçen her şeyi yapabilirim!” diye düşünen leydi, nişanlısına postayı koyup acımasız dükle bir ilişkiye başlamıştı. Olacakları işler çığırından çıkmadan önce bilemezdi. Aslında kendisine yanlış bir teşhis konulmuş, kısıtlı ömrü kalmamıştı! Bay Asrazan gülümsedi ve… “Şimdi kaçmaya çalışırsan bunun bedelini ödemek zorunda kalırsın.”

---

description.zh:
生命只剩最后三个月？
那我要和怪物公爵谈恋爱！
得知自己的生命只剩下三个月的拉丽爱特,想着反正自己活不长，索性在死之前完成自己的愿望清单!首先解决掉未婚夫老头儿，其次和怪物公爵埃斯拉翰谈三个月的恋爱!但逃离他身边之后，拉丽爱特才知道，自己的病竟然是…？!

---

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es:
Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!

---
Publicado en Español por [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/manga/serie/mision-familia-yozakura) como "Misión: Familia Yozakura" (2022)
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it: Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.ja: 超人見知りの高校生･朝野太陽が話せるのは、幼なじみの夜桜六美ただ一人。けれど六美は代々続くスパイ一家の娘で、極度のシスコンの兄が太陽排除に動き出した！　自らと六美を守るため太陽がとった手段とは!?
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

altTitles.ja: スライム聖女

altTitles.en: Slime Saint

description.en: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

altTitles.ja: オトメの帝国

altTitles.en: Virgins' Empire

description.en: A peek into the "everyday nudity" of high school girls. Virgins’ Empire is a look into the lives of seven high school girls attending an all girls school. We follow them as they grow relationships with one another. Some more intimate than others.

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

altTitles.en: The Wizard Ichi
Ichi the Warlock

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

title.en: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai de Chiryoushi Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 美醜逆転世界で治療師やってます

altTitles.en: I'm a Healer in the Reversed World of Beauty and Ugliness

description.en:
One day, Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read. 

It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However, the only ones who come are well-groomed, servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed. 

He is kind to everyone, no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes), and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world.
description.id:
Suatu hari, Towa tiba-tiba dipindahkan ke dunia baru. Dunia ini menyerupai dunia dari novel yang baru saja dibaca Towa.

Sudah setengah tahun sejak dia datang ke dunia ini. Towa membuka klinik sebagai Penyembuh menggunakan kemampuan yang diterimanya dari Dewi.

Namun, satu-satunya yang datang adalah wanita cantik yang terawat dan seperti budak. DIkarenakan ini adalah dunia dimana nilai keindahan dan keburukan dibalik.
description.ja:
不遇な美女冒険者たちの寄る辺ないココロとカラダを癒やします♪

美醜の価値観が逆転した世界に転生した主人公・トーワ。女神様から受けた転生特典“治癒能力”を活かし治療院を営んでいたある日、見るからに美しいエルフ少女が治療を受けにやって来る。しかし、なぜか腰をガクガクしていて様子がおかしい……と思ったら、トーワを押し倒していきなり襲いかかってきて――！？

altTitles.en: The Shaman's Blade
Jakdu: Shaman's Blade

description.en: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---
**Links** 

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-and-the-sage-reincarnated-and-engaged)
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

altTitles.ja: ブラッククローバー

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !


**Liens:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802)  *(special)* 
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) *(anime)*
description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

altTitles.ja: アイ・ドント・クライ

description.en:
Himeno Aki, youngest member of idol unit "Za-G," is frustrated with the group's decline in popularity, and the other members' lack of enthusiasm. To top it all off, their manager suddenly steps down. Replacing him is Kasahara, a man with a soft smile and an air of unreliability. Former idol and manager; a chance encounter with destiny.

Set in the same universe as **union**, the two stories are not exactly related, although there is some character overlap.

Source: MangaUpdates
description.ja:
元アイドルと、マネージャー。
運命のひととの出会いが、思いがけない扉を叩く。

アイドルユニットZa-G(ザジー)の最年少メンバー・姫野亜樹。かつての人気も落ち込み、仕事に意欲を見せないメンバーたちに苛立ちを募らせていたある日、担当していたやり手マネージャーが突如降任。新しくやってきたのは、ふわふわ笑っていかにも頼りない笠原という男だったーーー。

altTitles.ja: 今日、俺んち寄ってく?

altTitles.en: Why Don't You Stop By My Home, Today?

description.en:
*"Men are much better than women at giving oral."
"Really...?"*

Kikuchi is a laid-back, thickheaded, yet softhearted high school boy. He regularly hangs out with his close friend, Seto, at either of their houses after school. One day, after Kikuchi got aroused by porn, Seto suggests helping the other get off. Kikuchi gets hooked on Seto's—who's gay and is apparently used to these things—blowjob and offers to return the favor to show his gratitude (?). When Kikuchi thinks that Seto is hitting it off with a female classmate, he feels a pain in his chest for some reason...?

title.en: Kyuuketsu Hime wa Barairo no Yume wo Miru

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫は薔薇色の夢をみる
Princess wa Barairo no Yume wo Miru

altTitles.en: The Princess Has a Rosy Dream
Vampire Princess' Rose-Colored Dream

description.en:
"She" was supposed to have fallen into eternal sleep. However, a sudden accident woke her up, and "he" find "herself" reincarnated in a game "he" was playing when "he" was alive.

"I" have reincarnated as my own character, a beautiful vampire princess, and while surrounded by her demon underlings that "I" raised in the game, "I" ended up reigning at the top of a demon empire...!
description.ja: ある日、死んだはずの「ボク」が目覚めてみたら、生前プレイしていたオンラインゲームの主人公「吸血姫」に生まれ変わっていた。ゲームの世界で生きていくことになった「ボク」は、人類殲滅をもくろむ部下(モンスター)の期待に応えるべく、巨大魔帝国の国主として、世界を蹂躙する旅に出るーーー！これは、ゲーマーだったチキンな「ボク」が異世界転生し、最強の美少女になって、世界に君臨する物語――。

title.en: The Holy Power of Modern Medicine

altTitles.en: To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor

description.en:
Jin Yoosung was a gifted surgeon said to be able to bring the dead back to life. However, not even this genius doctor had the ability to revive himself. Following a fatal car crash, Yoosung closed his eyes for what he'd thought was the last time… only to wake up and find that he's been reborn in a fantasy world!

A doctor through and through, Yoosung — now Ray — resolves to become a healer again. Unfortunately, it seems his new magical abilities may not be the most fitting for his dream career…
description.ko:
천재 의사로 의학계에 이름을 떨치던 유성.
수술실을 집처럼 여기던 그는 어느 날 교통사고로 죽게 되고,
정신을 차려 보니 다른 세계로 떨어져 버렸다.

그런데.
성녀…성국…힐링 마법이라고?

"내가 얼마나 힘들게 의학을 배웠는데, 손만 대 놓고 치료 끝?
아, 나. 진짜 미쳐버리겠네."
description.pt-br:
Yusung é um médico genial e famoso no mundo da medicina. Sua vida é dedicada à sala de cirurgia, mas tudo muda quando ele morre em um acidente de trânsito e, ao acordar, se vê em um mundo completamente diferente. Nesse novo mundo, existe uma santa e um império sagrado, e a magia de cura é uma realidade. 
Para Yusung, que passou toda a sua vida estudando medicina, é difícil acreditar que agora tudo o que ele precisa fazer é tocar em alguém para curá-lo. É uma experiência surreal que o faz questionar sua sanidade.

I Was Discovered by the Villain

description.de:
Niemand hat sie gefragt. Dennoch ist sie ab jetzt eine Romanfigur, und was für eine! Nur eine Nebenfigur, die Schwester eines Schwächlings! Im Roman fällt ihr Bruder auf die Tricks des Bösewichts herein. Nun versucht sie das Unheil durch Erziehung und Schwesterliebe abzuwenden. Lieben soll er und Verantwortung tragen! Doch gerade mit der Liebe übertreibt er es und flieht über Nacht mit seiner Geliebten… Wer übernimmt nun die Verantwortung für die Familie? Sie, natürlich! Dabei ist sie die Nebenfigur schlechthin: die Schwester einer Nebenfigur! Und so wird eine Nebenfigur zur Heldin!

---

description.en:
Although she had been a promising practitioner of kendo in the past, due to an accident she was forced to lead a plain life. After Seo Yuri gets into a car accident during a trip back home, she reincarnates into the novel, *The Song of the Moon*, and becomes the elder twin sister of a side character who meets a destructive ending– Selena. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights’ squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!

---
A lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but she’s doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity won’t be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning "Sir Celestine" into his top henchman. With the threat of execution looming over her head, can Selena avoid getting caught by the villain?

---

description.es:
Toda una vida como prodigio de la esgrima preparó a Eunha para su nuevo papel de Selena Evan, personaje secundario e hija de un espadachín de renombre. La vida no es tan mala después de ser absorbida por un mundo ficticio, pero está condenada a sufrir una muerte prematura si no puede escapar de las garras del malvado príncipe Ignis. Cuando el hermano gemelo de Selena, Celestine, huye antes de su servicio militar obligatorio, no tiene más remedio que alistarse bajo su nombre para evitar que toda su familia sea ejecutada. Pero ocultar su identidad no será tan fácil una vez que Ignis tome nota de sus impresionantes habilidades con la espada y fije su mirada en convertir a “Sir Celestine” en su principal secuaz. Con la amenaza de ejecución sobre su cabeza, ¿Podrá Selena evitar que el villano la atrape?

---
No vas a encontrar una vida (y muerte) tan complicada como la de Yuri Seo. Primero, muere en un accidente automovilístico. Luego, mágicamente, reencarna como Selena, la hermana gemela de Celestín, ambos personajes de la novela "La canción de la luna". Yuri Seo –ahora Selena– sabe exactamente qué pasará en la novela y, como sea, quiere evitar que su hermano tenga un final trágico. Sin embargo, en su intento por evitarlo, Celestín termina escapándose con el amor de su vida y ahora Selena debe alistarse en el ejército, haciéndose pasar por su hermano. ¿Qué más le depara a Yuri Seo en su nueva vida?

description.fr:
Alors qu’elle est sur le point de se faire renversée, une jeune femme se retrouve propulsée dans l’histoire de sa dernière lecture! Le problème: elle devient un personnage secondaire vouée à une mort atroce, la sœur du futur bras droit du méchant. Pour changer le cours de l'histoire et éviter de mourir, elle va sensibiliser son frère à l’importance de l'amour. Mais à la veille de son service militaire obligatoire, il s'enfuit avec sa bien-aimée! La responsabilité familiale revient à sa sœur… qui n’a d’autre choix que de le remplacer en secret au sein de l’armée impériale.

description.ko:
“친애하는 호위야.”

남동생 대신 악역의 부하가 되었다. 내 목표는 조용히 사는 것뿐. …이었는데.

“도망칠 생각하면 죽여버린다.”
“끝까지 내 옆에 있어. 내가 황제가 될 때까지.”

어찌 된 일인지 악역의 집착을 받고 있다.
나 좀 내버려 두면 안 될까. 조용히 살고 싶다고!

description.ru:
После того, как Со Ынха попадает в аварию, она перевоплощается в романе «Песня Луны» и становится Селеной- старшей сестрой-близнецом второстепенного персонажа, которого ожидает смерть. Она надеется предотвратить уничтожение своей семьи. И по этому вынуждена занять место своего беглого брата Селестина, который должен был отправиться на военную службу! Сможет ли она избежать кары принца за проступок брата и выжить ?!

description.uk:
Со Юрі є багатообіцяючим талантом кендо, поки вона не потрапила в аварію і не була змушена жити простим, нудним життям. Після чергової аварії, повертаючись додому, Со Юрі виявила, що її перенесли в роман «Пісня місяця». Її особистістю в цьому романі була старша сестра-близнюк Селена. Доля Селени, врешті-решт, буде руйнівною, і, незважаючи на те, що вона лише побічний персонаж, вона хотіла врятувати свою сім’ю. З цієї причини вона була змушена зайняти вакансію свого брата Селестіна в лицарській ескадрильї, оскільки він вирішив втекти, не зважаючи на можливий вплив на сім’ю. Чи зможе вона здійснити своє бажання?

---

description.vi:
Mặc dù trước đây cô từng là một học viên đầy triển vọng của kiếm đạo, nhưng do một tai nạn,mà cô buộc phải sống một cuộc sống bình thường.Sau khi Seo Yuri gặp tai nạn xe hơi trong lúc trở về nhà từ chuyến đi du lich,cô ấy đã trọng sinh vào cuốn tiểu thuyết, "The Song of the Moon", và trở thành người chị gái song sinh của một nhân vật phụ có một kết cục ko tốt đẹp - Selena. Selena hy vọng sẽ ngăn chặn được sự huỷ hoại của gia đình mình, tuy nhiên, cô ấy buộc phải thế chỗ cho người anh trai bỏ trốn của mình, Celestine, trong đội hiệp sĩ! Liệu cô có thể tránh được Thái tử phản diện, Ignis và sống sót không?!

曾是劍道選手的徐銀河在歷經一場車禍後穿越成小說《月之歌曲》中遭滅門的艾班加的雙胞胎姊姊「賽琳娜」。賽琳娜為了阻止家門的滅亡而孤軍奮鬥，最終代替半夜與情人私奔的弟弟「賽勒斯汀」加入騎士團。究竟賽琳娜能否從小說中的反派皇子「伊格尼斯」手中守護著家族，順利活下去呢？

---

altTitles.en: Yotsuba And!

altTitles.ja: よつばと！

description.en:
Yotsuba is a strange little girl with a big personality! Even in the most trivial, unremarkable encounters, Yotsuba's curiosity and enthusiasm quickly turns the everyday into the extraordinary!

---
- **Won the Excellence Award for Manga at the Japan Media Arts Festival in 2006**


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2007)
description.ru:
Повседневная жизнь Ёцубы Койвай полна приключений. Она активная, любопытная и немного эксцентричная девочка. Настолько эксцентричная, что её отец прозвал её странной и несведущей в вещах, которые должны знать даже пятилетки. Из-за этого самое простое событие для неё становится настоящим приключением. Проходят дни, Ёцуба заводит новых друзей и показывает всем на личном примере, что каждый день может быть в радость.

---

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/104-yotsuba-to))

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

description.en: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja: 2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！ ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

description.en: Dionysus- the young boy who grew up on a small island with no memory of his family and his constant strange nightmares and dreams. One day, Dionysus decided to go on a journey to find his family and discover who he really was, alongside the love of his life, Ariadne.

altTitles.en: I Want to Hold Aono-kun so Badly I Could Die
I Want to Die Because I Want to Touch Aono

altTitles.zh: 想要触碰青野君所以我想死

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要觸碰青野君所以我想死

altTitles.ja: 青野くんに触りたいから死にたい

altTitles.ko: 아오노 군과 닿고 싶으니까 죽고 싶어

altTitles.fr: Je meurs d’envie de toucher Aono-kun

description.en: "I would die if it would allow me to touch you. That is my love." Airhead Yuri and her boyfriend Aono had a perfectly normal relationship until one day Aono suddenly “passed away” … They will never be bound together, and they cannot even touch. This is their difficult and almost too sincere love story.
description.ja: 君に触れるなら、死んでもいいよ。これがわたしの愛なんだ。天然少女・優里ちゃんと、その彼氏・青野くん。ごく普通のお付き合いをしていたふたりだが、ある日突然、青野くんが「いなくなって」しまう……。
description.vi:
Nếu là vì để được chạm vào cậu thì tớ chết cũng chẳng sao. Nghe kỳ lắm nhỉ? Nhưng đây là tình yêu của tớ. Tớ thích cậu nhiều lắm, Aono-kun!

Yuri-chan và bạn trai của cô ấy, Aono-kun, đã có một mối tình tuyệt vời cho đến một ngày, Aono-kun bỗng dưng qua đời... Họ sẽ không bao giờ đến được với nhau, và họ không thể chạm vào nhau. Đây là một câu chuyện về tình yêu chân thành nhưng cũng đầy những chông gai.

altTitles.vi: Sơn Ca Yêu Kiều Của Yêu Tinh

altTitles.ja: 優しい夜叉の鳥

altTitles.th: ท่านภูตใจดีกับนกไนติงเกล

description.en:
"Won't you become a Goblin's bride?"   
  
In Yang-an, the capital of the Shun Dynasty Empire, there are rumors of a Goddess who sings a song that grants your wishes in your dreams if you visit a certain pharmacy. To confirm this, Sa Heonyoung, who disguises his status as a member of the royal family, goes to find the Goddess of the rumors. After listening to her song, he yearns for her, as if he is suffering from an illness…  
  
A man who must kill his own identity under a goblin's mask; and a woman who has no name or a lover, and lives only for the revenge in her mother's will. A mournful love story between a man and a woman who are the only ones who can fully understand each other. 

---

description.ko:
"도깨비의 신부가 되지 않겠습니까?“

순나라의 황도 양안. 어느 약방에 찾아가면 신녀가 꿈속에서 소원을 이뤄 주는 노래를 불러 준다는 소문이 파다하다. 이를 검증하기 위해 신분을 속인 채 다른 이들 틈에 섞여 신녀를 찾아간 친왕, 사헌영. 그는 신녀의 노래를 듣고 난 뒤, 병을 앓듯 그녀를 찾게 되는데….

도깨비 가면을 쓴 채 자신을 죽이고 살아가야만 하는 남자. 외로운 산 속에서 하루 하루 죽음만을 기다리며 살아가는 이름 없는 여자. 온전히 자신을 알아주는 건 서로밖에 없는 남녀의 애절한 사랑 이야기.

description.zh-hk:
「妳願意當鬼怪的新娘嗎？」順王朝的帝都仰安有個傳聞，城裡某間藥房有一位能用歌聲讓人在夢中願望成真的巫女。為了證實這個傳聞，順王朝親王──思軒英，隱瞞自身身分親自去見了這位巫女，然而在聽完巫女的歌聲後，彷彿得了相思病一般，一直不斷找她…。一位只能戴著鬼怪面具隱藏自己真實身分的男子、一位在孤寂的山中等待死亡日度一日的女子，相遇後發現真正理解自己的只有彼此，一則關於男女愛戀情愁的故事。【​本作品為官方正式授權之15歲版本，請讀者們多多支持。】​

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

description.en:
Shuuma Aguri isn’t like other high school boys. He doesn’t get into sexual talks with his friends, and he sits alone. While he does have a secret fetish, he keeps it to himself - after all, who would willingly talk to a guy with a tickle fetish?

The only solace he has in his life is Anzu, a girl he met online who herself has a desire to be tickled. The two decide to meet up one day, only for Shuuma to find out that Anzu… is actually his teacher, Maiko Ogura?

description.en: Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer!
description.id: Leaf telah menikmati kehidupan yang damai di desanya di ujung terjauh negara itu, tetapi segalanya menjadi terbalik ketika tunangannya mengkhianatinya, merampok rumah, pekerjaan, dan semua yang dia hargai. Berkeliaran, bingung apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya, dia bertemu dengan seorang wanita terkemuka dalam bahaya yang akan mengubah hidupnya selamanya! Menggunakan kekuatan pengobatan dan obat-obatan yang dicemooh dunia, Leaf kini memulai perjalanannya untuk menjadi penyembuh yang maha kuasa! "
description.ja: 田舎者の少年・リーフが最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がる！人生を変える出会いが都会にはいっぱい！！無自覚無双な痛快“調薬”ファンタジーがここに開幕！！最強の“調薬”スキルで成り上がれ！！　田舎に住む少年・リーフは、ある日許嫁に裏切られ、すべてを失ってしまう。しかし、大貴族のお嬢様・プリシラと出会ったことでリーフの人生は激変！「薬を作れるだけなはず」の少年が、世界最強の冒険者になっていく！！

description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
description.uk: Після того, як—щось—змінилося в його житті чотири роки тому, Санні не виходив з дому навіть раз, живучі у своїй одинокій бульбашці. Сподіваючись на свіжий старт для свого сина, його мати вирішує вивезти родину з міста. Однак, коли його друг дитинства, Кел, повертається в його життя, Санні знову опиняється у світі, який він колись знав. Маючи тільки три дні до переїзду, хлопаки зустрічають знайомі обличчя, проходячи містом і пробуджуючи темні спогади, які Санні так сильно хотів забути.

description.en:
On his way home from school, Mitsuya Daiki - an ordinary high school student - finds a girl covered in wounds. Upon closer look, he finds that the girl has animal ears, but she licks Daiki's ears and leaves. Daiki begins to wonder if it was just a dream, when Sakuragami Ayame appears upon him…? After telling her of the ability of Daiki's ears, Ayame feels responsible for dragging him into this, and proposes an oath of absolute servitude to protect him at all costs!

description.ja:
ごく普通の高校生・三ツ矢大樹は、学校帰りに傷だらけの女の子を見つける。
よくみると動物の耳が生えている彼女は、大樹の耳を舐めると、立ち去っていった。
夢だったんじゃないか、と考え始めた大樹のもとに、桜神あやめが現れて――!?

大樹の耳が持つ力を伝えたあやめは、彼を巻き込んだ責任を感じ、なんとしても守るべく絶対従属の誓いを提案するのだった。
description.pt-br: A caminho de casa da escola, Mitsuya Daikiーum estudante comum do ensino médio encontra uma garota coberta de feridas. Ao olhar mais de perto, ele descobre que a garota tem orelhas de animais, mas ela lambe as orelhas de Daiki e sai. Daiki começa a se perguntar se foi apenas um sonho, quando Sakuragami Ayame aparece sobre ele…? Depois de contar a ela sobre a capacidade dos ouvidos de Daiki, Ayame se sente responsável por arrastá-lo para isso e propõe um juramento de servidão absoluta para protegê-lo a todo custo!

description.en:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".

Главный герой не хочет оставаться с начальницей, решая отправиться на приключения в одиночестве. Куда же его приведут эти странствия и встретятся ли они вновь?..

As a result, Emilone, who was devoted to her work as a saint, accidentally discovered the secret of Princess Ronella. The innocent and kind facades of the princess were all acting!  
This can be pretty fun. Wouldn't I be able to break my boring routine when I got closer to Princess Ronella?  
Emilone made a dangerous decision for fun.

description.en:
Isabelle is an orphan living in a temple with lots of knowledge about the love between men and women thanks to red covered novels that the saints had sneaked in.

But then, she found out that a priest secretly sold her to be a one-night stand for the duke who kills his lovers due to the shame of his inability to perform…

There’s only one way to get out of this, and it is to be a married woman.

At that moment, Isabelle recalled her childhood friend, Riggs, who said he wasn’t interested in dating.

“So, Riggs, marry me.”

“…What?”

“Nobles would refuse unless it’s a pure woman.”

“…Why do you hate the Duke of Cardiago so much?”

“Everything else is fine. Being a tyrant? If you’ve lived your life to the fullest, that could happen. But there can be no problems at night.”

Riggs was so frustrated that it seemed like he was going crazy.

A few days later, the reclusive Duke of Cardiago came to the temple.

Of course, the most surprising thing to Isabelle was the true identity of her childhood friend.

“Isabelle, you wanted to get married. You can’t say no because you proposed first. I’m the closest man to your ideal type anyway.”

“My ideal type?”

“Don’t I know your ideal type? You like guys who are tall, handsome, smell of soap at night, and sleep in simple clothes. Also, on the first night, the bed should break.”

“…”

“That’s everything, and I can do it all for you. So marry me.”

She once knew everything about her childhood friend, but that changed the moment they got married.

“Riggs, slow down…”

“I think I’m slow enough.”

“You weren’t always this impatient.”

Isabelle said pleadingly, but Riggs replied with a smirk.

“I was a childhood friend then, but now I’m your husband.”

---
Isabelle has always dreamed of meeting her true love and living happily ever after. Unfortunately, she discovers that she was just sold to the monstrous Duke Cardiego, who's infamous for killing his bride candidates. Her only way out is to quickly marry someone else, and as it turns out, her BFF, Lix, is the perfect choice! Although she tells him she will just stay a friend, Lix begins to show her that he doesn't feel the same way. Will their friendship be able to last through this matrimony?

After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival… as the female lead?!
